title: Love at the Sugar Plum Inn
description: He’s got two weeks to win her heart. After being jilted at the altar and fired from her job at her design firm, Madison Moore is struggling to find her usual Christmas joy. She’s sworn off men, so sitting around her dad’s house eating cookies, trying to distance herself from her hunky best friend isn’t the worst plan in the world. Luckily, he’s not the type to let her. Colton Atwood thought he lost his chance with Madison when she got engaged. Now that she’s back and single, timing couldn’t be more perfect. He knows having her design the inn they’ve always loved is exactly what she needs to find herself and heal her heart again, and he’s on a short timeline to show her that he, and Pine Cove Spings are home. Time is ticking for Madison and Colton to get the inn ready for the Christmas Tour of Homes and when he lays his heart on the line, she has to decide between old dreams and new. Will they find love at the Sugar Plum Inn?This novella was previously published in the Sugar Plum Kisses anthology (Nov. 2021), under the same title.
author: Monique Brasher
